channel.title: I was playing around in Auxy until I discovered Choir-type vocals
channel.description: Maybe I’m late. Maybe I made history. But, I discovered vocal sounds in Auxy! https://app.auxy.co/projects/TMSBIq4XJMXXtp3TNB2soA== I was playing around with a track me and @Xiejra are making. I don’t know how to say it but, this is how to make it, *I guess*. I think you use 3 or 4 different key tones in Silk with its tone and shape on 100% and it’s lowpass to 50%. That’s the simplest way I can put it to y’all.

item.title: I was playing around in Auxy until I discovered Choir-type vocals
item.dc:creator: anon6476606
item.description:
WOAH! so you STOPPED playing around in Auxy when you discovered Choir-type vocals???

jk

EDIT: this is a really cool patch, everyone go download it

Read full topic

Silk is loveeely. I used that “vocal” sound throughout this song. (It’s a bit long but it’s right at the start)

item.title: I was playing around in Auxy until I discovered Choir-type vocals
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
Maybe I’m late. Maybe I made history. But, I discovered vocal sounds in Auxy!
https://app.auxy.co/projects/TMSBIq4XJMXXtp3TNB2soA==
I was playing around with a track me and @Xiejra are making. I don’t know how to say it but, this is how to make it, I guess. I think you use 3 or 4 different key tones in Silk with its tone and shape on 100% and it’s lowpass to 50%. That’s the simplest way I can put it to y’all.

Read full topic
item.source: I was playing around in Auxy until I discovered Choir-type vocals
